name: Paloma Cocktail
description: Make paloma cocktails from scratch with this fresh recipe! You'll need tequila, grapefruit and lime, Topo Chico and simple syrup.
ingredients: Topo Chico or other sparkling water
Thin wedge of grapefruit, for garnish
instructions: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Pour in the tequila, grapefruit juice, lime juice, simple syrup, the tiniest pinch of salt, and optional bitters. Shake well for 10 to 15 seconds, until the shaker is ice cold. Set aside.  Fill a highball glass with ice. Strain the shaker mixture on top. Top with Topo Chico. Give the drink a gentle stir if the mixture does not appear evenly distributed.  Garnish the drink with a thin wedge of grapefruit. Enjoy.
